CustomField.description: Designates a user has decided the entitlement value manually. If checked, automation will no longer update the entitlement checkbox (e.g., when resolution code updated).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Designates a user has decided the entitlement value manually. If checked, automation will no longer update the entitlement checkbox (e.g., when resolution code updated).
CustomField.label: Entitlement Override
